tool_description: Certly develops a number of APIs to retrieve threat intelligence.
name: Certly
title: Certly

api_list.name: lookupUrl
api_list.description: This is what you want to call when scanning URLs from user-generated content.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: You must specify the URL to scan here.

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: You are encouraged to optionally pass the visitor's IPv4 address in this field.

api_list.name: lookupUrlByRaw
api_list.description: This is what you want to call when scanning URLs from user-generated content.

required_parameters.name: raw
required_parameters.description: Comment or forum post which will be parsed by Certly for URLs.

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: You are encouraged to optionally pass the visitor's IPv4 address in this field.
